# gux-time-zone-beta



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                          | Type      | Default     |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `offset`         | `offset`          | True to display the zone's offset from UTC                           | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `shorten`        | `shorten`         | True to shorten the displayed zone name: 'Europe/London' -> 'London' | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `surroundOffset` | `surround-offset` | True to display surround the offset with parentheses                 | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `timeZoneId`     | `time-zone-id`    | The id of the time zone to display                                   | `string`  | `undefined` |
